pkgmetadata.longdescription: a Keep It Simple Species Migration Model // Simulating species migration and range dynamics under stable or changing environmental conditions based on a simple, raster-based, deterministic or stochastic migration model. KISSMig runs on binary or quantitative suitability maps, which are pre- calculated with niche-based habitat suitability models (also called ecological niche models (ENMs) or species distribution models (SDMs)). Nobis Normand (2014), doi:10.1111/ecog.00930.
